posts.post_content:
Pfeister – G+/VG $20 – rounded corners and a couple very light creases. 
 
Lattimore – G+/VG #20 – presents as EX with no creases, but does have minor spots of paper loss on the back.

Owen – G $15 – rounded corners that goes from the left border (middle of the back) and slopes down towards his right arm.  

Congalton – VG+ $25 – a crease in the upper right corner, otherwise looks VG/EX.

Prices include delivery via PayPal F&F.  Regular PP OK, but please add 3%.  Want all 4?  How about $70 delivered?
